CustomField.description: Formula: If the Primary Address Type is Other, the Mailing Address. If the Secondary Address Type is Other, the Other Address.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(%%%NAMESPACE%%%Primary_Address_Type__c,"Other"), IF(ISBLANK(MailingStreet), "", MailingStreet & ", ") & IF(ISBLANK(MailingCity), "", MailingCity & ", ")& IF(ISBLANK(MailingState), "", MailingState & " ")& IF(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode), "", MailingPostalCode) & IF(ISBLANK(MailingCountry), "", ", " &MailingCountry) , IF(ISPICKVAL(%%%NAMESPACE%%%Secondary_Address_Type__c,"Other"), IF(ISBLANK(OtherStreet), "", OtherStreet & ", ") & IF(ISBLANK(OtherCity), "", OtherCity & ", ")& IF(ISBLANK(OtherState), "", OtherState & " ")& IF(ISBLANK(OtherPostalCode), "", OtherPostalCode) & IF(ISBLANK(OtherCountry), "", ", " & OtherCountry) ,"" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula: If the Primary Address Type is Other, the Mailing Address. If the Secondary Address Type is Other, the Other Address.
CustomField.label: Other Address
